fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Select one of three potions to use at night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-None of the potions you select will have their intended effect
-They are all just a button to stab your target
-If you are roleblocked, you will attack your roleblocker in addition to your targets
-When you automatically kill a roleblocker, the roleblock attempt will fail
-Roleblockers that target you will have their will covered in blood and will be unreadable
-At night, you may choose to spare roleblockers instead
